header: A Review of the Old Covenant and a Promise of the New

verse: In the seventh year, in the fifth month, on the tenth day of the month, men came from the elders of Israel to consult the Lord, and they sat down in front of me.
Then the word of the Lord came to me.
“Son of man, speak to the elders of Israel and tell them this.”
Therefore, speak to the house of Israel, son of man, and tell them this.
Therefore, say this to the house of Israel.
The word of the Lord came to me.
Then I said, “Oh, Lord God, they are saying about me, ‘Doesn’t he just talk in puzzling parables?’”
